item.title: CVE-2015-1869|2024-08-06T04:54:16.338Z -- abrt -- abrt
item.description: The default event handling scripts in Automatic Bug Reporting Tool (ABRT) allow local users to gain privileges as demonstrated by a symlink attack on a var_log_messages file.
